name: Luminous Matte Beauty Blush
about: What it is:A buildable blush for cheeks and eyes with a hydrating, ultra-thin powder..Highlighted Ingredients:- Shea Butter: Reduces the overall feeling of dryness..What Else You Need to Know:This formula of powders and pigments is infused with emollient waxes to deliver buildable, long-lasting color that intensifies seamlessly. The powder cares for all skin types with an infusion of shea butter, hyaluronic acid, and black rose oil, blending easily for a second-skin feel.
ingredients: -Black Rose Oil: Known for its soothing and hydrating properties. .-Emollient Waxes: For gorgeous colors that intensify seamlessly. ..Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Zinc Stearate, Silica, C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Mica, Sorbitan Isostearate, C20-24 Alkyl Dimethicone, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Maltodextrin, C20-24 Olefin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Parfum/Fragrance, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Limonene, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Rosa Hybrid Flower Extract, Tocopherol, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Carmine (Ci 75470), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Cheeks: .-Pick up some product with the help of an angled contour brush and tap off any excess. Apply it to the cheeks. .-Build up layers for more intensity if desired...Eyes:.-Pick up a small amount of product with the help of a flat eye brush or medium fluffy brush and tap off any excess. Apply it to the eyelids. .-Build up layers for more intensity if desired.

reviews.review_title: The Blush We All Need In Our Lives.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands downu2014 Gucci Beauty has made the best blush Iu2019ve ever worn. Itu2019s hard to believe this is the brandu2019s first blush. Literally the creamiest powder blush Iu2019ve ever used. Because Iu2019ve been tanning recently, I chose 09 Intense Plum & Iu2019m so happy I did. Iu2019m obsessed with the shade. Itu2019s pretty both sheer & bold. More speaking, Gucci blush is very buildable. Even better, this blush blends very easily; almost melting into the skin like butter. Iu2019ve included swatches of Intense Plumu2014 the left showing one layer & the right showing two. With & without flash. In addition to being creamy & blendable, the formula of this blush is extremely hydrating while maintaining a matte finish. Also, the packaging is super cute & includes a mirror making it travel friendly, which is awesome. Before deciding how much I loved this blush, I wore Gucci blush during a night out & also at work while exerting physical labor. I noticed it was much longer lasting than I originally assumed it would be. Even after sweating for a bit with a sheer application, it still looked freshu2014 closely resembling being naturally flushed. The only downside is the price point as it may seem a bit steep to the budget friendly makeup girlies. But I promise, itu2019s worth it. All in all, I definitely recommend this blush to anyone who appreciates great, high-end makeup products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Gucci Blush de Beautu00e9 in Intense Plum feels like the perfect mix of old-school glam and modern elegance. The packaging is stunningu2014light pink and gold with such a chic, girly vibe. Itu2019s the kind of compact you actually want to show off, not just toss in your bag. The shade Intense Plum is everythingu2014super pigmented, so you only need a little for a soft, everyday look, but it builds beautifully for a bold, dramatic vibe. The texture is smooth and blends like a dream on both cheeks and eyelids. No scent, which is a big win for me. Itu2019s honestly such a luxe product, and I canu2019t wait to try the other shades!

You do not have to use a lot to achieve a nice rosy cheek, but this blush is definitely buildable if you like more color coverage. With the small amount needed to achieve the look I like, this blush is going to last me quite some time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been eyeing this Gucci Blush de Beautu00e9 in Bright Coral for a while now because of the super cute packaging. I think it looks absolutely cute and stylish. I finally got to try it and can say that it definitely lives up to the hype.   The formula is smooth, blendable, and buildable. You can create a subtle or more intense look, depending on the occasion and your likes. My makeup artist suggested I try the peach shade and she was so right, it is really flattering for most complexions! It adds this touch of warmth, which is great for the cold winters! I know the price might be a bit high since it is a luxurious product, but the well-pigmented formula and stunning packaging are worth it, if in your budget, especially if you like luxurious items.  I'm planning on adding more shades to my collection soon! I really loved this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The excellent formula of this blush has been established by other reviewers.  I am writing a review about the colors.  I have very pale skin and natural red hair.  I purchased 01-Silky Rose earlier this year and found that it is too bright and surprisingly too cool in color for me.  I was disappointed, because I don't think any of the other permanent colors would work for me if 01-Silky Rose didn't (02-Tender Apricot would definitely be too orange for me, and 05-Rosy Beige looks like it would be too gray).  I was incredibly excited to see 10-Soft Peach released for the holidays!  I ordered it, and I absolutely love it.  It is a fantastic every day blush color, but the color can also be built up in intensity.  The formula of this color is also just as good as the formula of the permanent colors.  I really hope that 10-Soft Peach is added as a permanent color - I really feel that it fills a gap in the current lineup of colors for this blush, and I want to be able to repurchase it when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For reference, I have combination skin: oily and eczema prone. The pictures included have zero filters or alterations.  This is a soft, blendable blush with a sheen of luminosity. Shade 4 leans more orange than coral-pink on my medium olive skin. Shade 4 would flatter anyone with an olive, neutral, and/or warm undertone with a fair to medium skin tone.  PROS: -The pearl finish leaves a fresh gleam without any chunks of glitter or obvious sparkle. -I swatched this around dry patches/textured areas of my face. The shimmer didn't emphasize the texture and it didn't catch onto any patches. -The packaging is sturdy with a secure clasp. I'm able to pop the latch open without issues from my long nails. It feels like it would last a couple of drops. -The blush is buildable so you can control the intensity of color. It makes it great for a beginner and those who prefer a soft finish.  MINUS 1 STAR: -The price. You'd have to be a fan of luxury to justify paying $49 for a blush. Full disclosure, I received this for free as a training product. I personally would wait for a sale to splurge on buying 1 shade.  NITPICKS: -The blush is buildable, BUT it took a bit for it to show up on me. The soft wash of color it gives and the fact that most of the shades have a white pigment base means that the blushes cater to lighter skin tones. Shades 6, 8 and 9 have richer pigments for those with more melanin rich skin than me. Anyone can wear any shade, but I don't personally reach for blushes that I have to build up a ton. -It blends better over a powdered face. I sometimes apply powder blush before I set my face for a dewy finish style of makeup, but this didn't work with that technique. Versatility is more of a personal preference for me, so this might not apply to everyone's style.

reviews.review_text: This Blush de Beautu00e9 in True Pink by Gucci is a really lovely product. Its packaging is just beautiful! Once you take the blush out of the box, it will reveal a gorgeous little compact! Yes, itu2019s actually a little compact, it has a mirror. That was a fun surprise! The color is so pretty and the texture is smooth. There is a bit of a scent that I would say is some type of floral. I donu2019t tend to love floral scents but I was fine with this one. I took one star off because as beautiful and feminine as the color is, it will easily wipe right off the skin with a tissue. So to wear this blush successfully, Iu2019d recommend a good setting spray and perhaps keep the compact on hand for any possible touch ups-maybe thatu2019s why itu2019s a blush with a built in mirror! Considering the price point, I would have liked it to be more long lasting but itu2019s overall a very nice makeup product and if you are okay with possibly reapplying throughout the day, then this just might be a good fit for you!

reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying out this product, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations in every aspect. First and foremost, let's talk about the texture. Unlike some matte blushes that can appear flat or chalky, Gucci's formula manages to strike the perfect balance between matte and luminous, giving the skin a natural-looking radiance without any shimmer.The pigmentation is another standout feature of this blush. With just a light swipe of the product, you can achieve a subtle flush of color that can easily be built up for a more intense look. The shade range is also impressive, offering options to suit a variety of skin tones.One of the things I appreciate most about this blush is its longevity. Once applied, it stays put throughout the day without fading or becoming patchy. This is particularly important for those with oily or combination skin, as it means you won't have to worry about constant touch-ups.If you're in the market for a high-end blush that will elevate your makeup routine, look no further than this beauty from Gucci.

reviews.review_title: A must have in your beauty bag!

reviews.review_text: First off love the package, it is all gold with a pink top. It has a great compact mirror in the inside as well. I revived the radiant pink and it was great quality. The pink made my cheeks pop!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging of the blush is so pretty as it features a soft pink shade w engraved gold stars on top. It also has a slightly heavy, solid feel & is portable and secure to take with you on the go. This blush is fantastic for all skin types! It goes on smoothly & blends to the skin exceptionally well. It also lasts me all day, so I don't need to reapply which is another great thing. This blush is actually my color, & it was quite pigmented. The color I chose was intense plum, & let me tell you I was not disappointed. I literally took my brush & dipped it  in the blush every so slightly before applying it to my face, & the color was  really pigmented when i applied it which is amazing. I was seeking for a blush that leans more towards a heavier rosy pink & red tone, & this delivered. I generally apply blush to my cheeks and nose, so I hope the photographs show how cute this blush is. I definitely recommend you this blush even if it is a bit on the pricier side because a little bit of product goes a long way.  The color is stunning & itu2019s long lasting what can get better than that?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

Itu2019s not just for cheeks apply it under your eyes, above your eyes, wherever you want some color on your face. Itu2019s on the pricier side, but itu2019s worth a purchase. Iu2019d buy it and recommend it.

reviews.review_title: Love the cute packaging! Nice pop of color.

reviews.review_text: I love the box that contains the blush. Besides its prettiness, it is functional- easy to open, compact enough to carry in a purse and includes a mirror.  As for the blush itself, to each their color. This one, Bright Coral, works for my fair skin. It is buildable so it can be used for day time and at night by adding more blush.  A touch on the eyelids that matches the cheeks makes a very soft and sweet look.  The real difference is the addition of hyaluronic acid and shea butter that prevents the skin from drying out.  It is lightly scented, which I like, but some might prefer unscented make up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Gucci Blush de Beaute in radiant pink is so beautiful! It's the perfect pink shade for any skin tone. The blush packaging/container is so cute! It is gold, with little stars, and just so nice!  It is durable, opens up easily, and closes easily to protect the product. A little product goes a long way. Just a dab, and the product goes on smoothly, and the pink color is vibrant.  You can use as little or as much as you'd like to, in order to help you achieve the look you desire. 10 out of 10, recommend.  I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion.

The plum shade actually is my most favorite plum blush shade, itu2019s just perfect color representative in my opinion.  I do recommend this blush, if your budget allows. reviews.review_text: After trying out the 01, GUCCI BLUSH DE BEAUTu00c9 in Silky Rose, I'm thrilled to share my experience. This shade is an absolute dream for my fair skin tone. Its buildable formula allows me to achieve just the right level of color intensity, whether I'm going for a subtle glow or a more bold look. What I love most is its versatility; it works beautifully as both a cheek and eye color, making it a staple in my makeup routine. The ultra-thin powder effortlessly blends for a flawless finish every time, and the added ingredients like Shea Butter and Hyaluronic Acid ensure my skin stays hydrated and comfortable. And let's not forget the delightful scent of Vintage Peony, which adds a touch of luxury to the experience. Overall, this blush has become a favorite in my collection, delivering both stunning color and skincare benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Blush de Beaute is Gucciu2019s first makeup powder blush and it is to die for. And itu2019s actually affordable, retailing at $49. I mean, that is pricey for a blush but not so pricey considering itu2019s Gucci. And itu2019ll probably be your new favorite blush, too. Itu2019s very highly pigmented so a little powder goes a long way, and the product should last a long time. I put a little on my fingers and blended it onto my cheeks and eyelids - itu2019s multi-use, you can use it as an eyeshadow too. It looks extra pretty having your eyeshadow match your blush and with the easily buildable coverage you could experiment with different looks like intense eyeshadow and subtle blush. You really can achieve both subtle and dramatic looks with this blush and everything in between. You could wear it every day and for special occasions alike. Itu2019s a really good quality product with an excellent satiny smooth powder texture that is easy to use to create whatever lovely look youu2019re going through. I honestly canu2019t recommend it enough, and the Intense Plum is a gorgeous vibrant shade that would flatter any skin tone, this blush truly has to be experienced. Invest in some!

Maybe itu2019s that my skin already gives off a pink glimmer or that I am just scared of not using it properly(I was a kid in the 80u2019s so I have good reason to believe this, if you remember blush from the 80u2019s) I was a bridesmaid in a wedding and the MUA applied blush. I didnu2019t hate it but I also never really invested time into learning how to apply it so I didnu2019t look like a circus clown. I chose this peach shade, hoping that it wouldnu2019t expose more of the redness in my skin. At first, it looked like I applied it too heavily and was about to have orange stained tears rolling down my cheeks. I blended it out into a soft peach color and actually liked the results. Maybe I will start to ease up my hesitation on blush now. Other stand out features to this product is the packaging! This is exactly what I would expect from Gucci. Beautiful gold features with little gold stars. The Gucci name imprinted into the blush and the prominent logo on top of the compact. It looks quite stunning amongst my makeup collection.  *I received this complimentary of Influenster to try out and give my honest opinion about*

It gives a natural just in from the cold flush to my vampire pale skintone but will also work across a variety of others.  I also own True Pink, Rosy Beige and Silky Rose (purchased all 4 myself) and can't recommend the line enough; you won't be disappointed, whichever shade you choose!

reviews.review_title: Not a must-have, cheap packaging, 100% dupable
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product with my own money. This blush really isn't worth the price tag. I got it because I was on the hunt for a replacement for my favorite blush that was discontinued. The formula is very nice, and it diffuses easily. The color is a nice warm medium pink that works for my medium olive skin tone, but I'm not sure it would work for anyone darker than that because as I apply more layers, it develops a pearly finish that can start to look chalky. My other major gripe is that the packaging doesn't feel luxe at all, and at this price point, that's unacceptable. It's mostly plastic and quite bulky, and the clasp doesn't actually close properly so it's only a matter of time before it breaks. Blush is my favorite makeup item so I've tried a lot of them and I'm not afraid to spend on a good product, so trust me when I say that once you cut past all the hype, this product is just okay and you can definitely find cheaper and better. I wouldn't repurchase or recommend.

reviews.review_text: Love this shade! Very soft matte finish perfect for fall! Canu2019t wait till they release more shades. The formula and finish are perfect:)

reviews.review_title: Pretty, but not amazing, and not as vibrant
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice blush, it applies well and the packaging is very cute, but I have two issues with it. 1) I find it hard to open, and because it is so small, it easily flies out of your hands. 2) It's not very pigmented and not as much as I thought based on the picture. The pink is not as vibrant as I was hoping and it pulls slightly peachy on my porcelain skin. I'm adding a picture of it (left), next to the Sephora pic (right) for comparison. For the price, I wanted more, so sadly, it will go back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to buy this because of the hype, but I decided to take a chance and I'm glad I did. The blush is silky smooth and buildable. The packaging is very luxe. I got color 5 and it's not too dark for my fair skin. Will likely get one more in shade 3 during VIB sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These stays on your cheeks for 15 hours with mask on ...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Within the past month I have purchased at least 5 blushes and this one is certainly is a winner. The color is perfect, almost taupe with rose tones, on my cool/light complexion. Luminous matte is a perfect description. Then blush leaves a radiant finish without micro glitters, just beautiful. I found it to apply and blend extremely easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The rosy beige / rosy tan color is very unique. A slightly taupe leaning rose shade is the best way to describe it. It works on my very fair skin and also works on more medium skintones as well. The finish is very blurring and has a beautiful sheen that looks glowy. It reminds me of the Pat McGrath blushes but just a bit more shiny. A little bit stiff to pick up and blend but still has good pigment for a blush (not too much). The packaging is plastic but feels heavy and cold. The blush is scented with the sweet fruity floral Gucci makeup scent and it lingers on my brushes but not on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush! I love this color! This works perfectly, goes on smooth, look perfect and has beautiful application. I donu2019t care how much this costs, I am buying it every single time I need to buy blush!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Usually I have a hard time choosing bluch because of my skin tone but this was the one! I actually found my new favorite. I'm glad they added the mirror to it for quick apply. The case quality is very nice however I'm just not a fan of the stars on top, gives it a toy look. Gucci for the win

reviews.review_title: Eyes cheeks must to have must 2 go
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved it you can love it only because if from the packaging the smell the duration of pigmentation ease of blurring and how natural it can be seen as well as loaded simply you decide how pigmented you prefer it I have used it in makeup as seen in the photo and I have only used it on top of my skin care routine and I love it both ways it lasts a long time I do not make lumps or patches my favorite in addition to a super practical easy packaging to carry wherever I go

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product for free for my honest review, thanks Influenster. This  Blush is amazing, the color looks very natural and pigmented. Just take a little amount and blend it with Sponge. The texture and formula are looking nice after application, with no lumps or smears, long-lasting))) Nice design, and a perfect size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this in shade Tender Apricot which was a light peach. The blush itself was itty bitty but so adorable. The powder was soft and smooth and smelled sooooo good. The payoff was buildable so you can go for a soft wash of color all the way up to a vibrant pop. Really liked this blush and am deff interested in the other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I quite liked it!!  It is colorful and at the same time discreet, excellent to use during the day, without a doubt, I would buy it, it has a soft texture and is easy to spreadu2026 it works both as an eyeshadow and as a blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite part was that I can use this as a blush and an eyeshadow. Iu2019m obsessed with monochromatic looks (very OG Patrick Ta) I wasnu2019t expecting to love it. I thought it would be too light of a color for some reason, but itu2019s such a lovely color. I like using it with a big fluffy blush or a fan brush on the cheeks. I find itu2019s better to use fingers on the eyes to get it more pigmented but it does help add a touch of monochromatic vibes on the crease - doesnu2019t have to be the main event on my eyes Super buildable not super sheer, and not super dry or opaque. Also buttery soft, so sad I lost it bc itu2019s super sold out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is simply gorgeous. I have Radiant Pink, and itu2019s a beautiful sheer but buildable blush. I love the shade, I love the packaging, and I especially love the fact that it is refillable! Once youu2019re done, you can orders refill and pop the old one out! Which means you always have the pretty packaging! I use it daily as a light wash of color, however Iu2019ve built it up for nights out. I even use it on my eyes! I end my eyeshadow look by putting some in the crease over the shadow I already have on. It really ties the look together. A+ blush that I will be refilling because I will definitely hit pan on this baby!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time Gucci wearer & its AMAZING! This matte powder goes great with my neutral warm complexion. Its perfect for both a natural & classy look. Goes on smoothly & doesnu2019t look cakey or rub off easily after a few hours of wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was given this product to try and and I really like it! Iu2019ve never tried such a dark blush before but I loved how pigmented it was! Everytime Iu2019ve worn this blush it last all day and definitely has a matte finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging is superior! Very cute and high quality. That said the blush was just okay in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best blush I have ever used. The compact with the little mirror and stars, is super pretty and aesthetically pleasing.  I was absolutely thrilled to see that they had this warm berry color. Most blush products I encounter or try.. tend to completely clash with my complexion or just dont look right on me. I am a person that has always had a lot of redness and pinkness in my skin. Especially my cheeks. So while I don't use blush every day, I have tried quite a few different ones. Not only does this warm berry color look wonderful on a lot of different skin tones, it glides on smoothly, blends out easily, and lasts quite a while. My favorite part is that it is not only safe but recommended to use as eye shadow as well. The color really works for both. Its wonderfully pigmented, blends easily, it lasts a while, etc. I would 1,000% recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a big fan of Nars blush, so it takes a lot for me to stray away but this one is a too contender!! Great color, long lasting if set correctly. I will say though, Iu2019m not a huge fan of the scent- while it doesnu2019t linger long, I think it dries out my skin. Not sure if the two correlate but it is something that I noticed. Overall its a great blush and if youu2019re in the market for something new, give it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This color is perfection and applies like a dream. I do have trouble opening the packaging each time I use this, but other than that quite happy with my purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging for this blush is absolutely stunning. It is a beautiful, shiny rose gold with a pink top patterned with rose gold stars and the u201cGucciu201d name, circular compact that is sturdy, easy to open,  and has a mirror inside. The blush itself is nice and opaque but can be soft or layered for a more dramatic look. It is powdery and soft but not chalky. It does have a strong luxurious rose scent that I donu2019t think everyone would love. I like this blush overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product free for testing purposes and for my honest review; this blush very closely matched the blush I use every day so it was a seamless transition to try it.  The feel of the blush itself is light and very fine which makes application easy. The packaging also feels strong which is great because I drop things all the time! Itu2019s also relatively easy to open. The only thing I didnu2019t like is the scent- a little too perfumey for my liking. Overall a good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Bright Coral Luminous Matte Blush as part of a Voxbox campaign in exchange for my honest opinion. The color is lovely with my skin, and brighter than what I would normally choose, but Iu2019m glad. The color when worn is definitely a peachy coral, but extremely wearable. It has a hint of a glow when applied, but subtle. The formula is buildable, and applying more does not look garish or clown-like due to the formulation. I have worn this every day since receiving it a couple weeks ago, and I am very happy with it. Thank you Influenster and Gucci for this opportunity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Le Blush Gucci Beauty est juste sublime.  Effet bonne mine garantit avec la teinte 04 sweet peach.  Sa texture est fondante et se travaille tru00e8s facilement.  Lu2019odeur est du00e9licate et tru00e8s agru00e9able.  Son packaging est un vu00e9ritable petit bijou.  Son format compact est idu00e9al pour le transporter partout avec moi.  Le petit plus de ce produit de beautu00e9 cu2019est sa double utilisation.  En effet, cu2019est un blush et u00e9galement un fard u00e0 paupiu00e8res.  Moi qui adore mariu00e9es les couleurs, je suis au ange.  Je suis une fan de la maison Gucci et son savoir faire haut de gamme se retrouve aussi dans le monde la beautu00e9.  Cu2019est une tru00e8s belle du00e9couverte, et je suis conquise.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t normally wear blush but this Gucci one I received from Influencer for my review was gorgeous. I'll be honest,  I didn't even know Gucci did makeup, but they hit it out of the park with this one. It was smooth, blended beautiful, and was so flattering. I felt very pretty wearing this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pigment! Lightweight formula! Beautiful shades! Gorgeous packaging.. love love love this blush. I was gifted the blush and itu2019s just so good

reviews.review_text: I love this product. Goes on buttery smooth and itu2019s perfect to take with you out of town because I can use it on my cheeks and my eyes

reviews.review_title: Nothing special... Enhanced my texture skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did like the color , but for $50 it def Enhanced my textured skin & pores.. I wanted to Love it and I did But I cannot justify spending that much for ok results... Smell is signature GUCCI ,.. did not bother me...I will day you have to build it up.. its silky powder blush..I Returned it... LOVE The Gucci Bronzer #2

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. A little goes a long way and I love the packaging. The best thing is itu2019s not too u201cdryu201d or too powdery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have this blush in the shade rosy beige, and although itu2019s not a shade Iu2019d normally pick I can honestly say I am so pleased with it. I love that this compact is so cute, small, and simple, making it easy to use, and carry around in your purse. This formula is also true to color, and is very light as well. A little goes a long way, so itu2019s definitely buildable. Another thing I love about this blush is how easy it goes on the skin, I have not only used it as blush, but also as an eyeshadow. And wow the amount of questions and compliments this little blush as gotten me. Let me also mention that this blush is lightly scented, it has a nice clean floral smell that does wear off after a while. So no lingering scent. But it does smell amazing, not like those other blushes that smell the chemicals.  I am completely obsessed with it!!! Itu2019s a must have in your makeup bag!   (This blush was sent to me by gucci)

reviews.review_title: A little bit goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is buildable but a little bit goes a long way. It has fantastic pigmentation without being overpowering. I received the color Silky Rose and silky is how I would describe the texture of this blush. It feels amazing on my skin not too dry but not too creamy either. It also smells exquisite! I highly recommend this blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color of this product on my light skin, but it did take quite a bit of product to be able to see it. Blended well otherwise, wore well throughout the day. Did not bother my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is truly so beautiful! Everything from the packaging to the application is literally perfection! The blush is buildable and blends so smoothly. It has a matte finish, but it doesnu2019t make your skin feel dry at all. I would definitely recommend this product to everyone of all skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I got this and saw it in my package I immediately thought of an old fashioned pill container. It's adorable. I love the look of it. The mirror is useful and I've needed it when out. The blush is soft and richly colored. I unfortunately did not take a pic of myself wearing it but I just want to say this is really good make up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received these products for free from @influenster in exchange for my honest review. I truly love the color. Itu2019s Silky Rose 01. It is very soft pinku2019ish. Gives soft and natural blush on my cheeks. I also can wear it as a mascara. And the packaging is so cute and good size. I have no problem wearing it whole day and everyday. Thank you ! Looks like Iu2019m going to stick with it for my daily natural look make up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gucci products are always a hit for me so I am very excited to receive this blush. It picks up well with a brush and deposits a nice amount. Can be built up or sheered out. Iu2019ve also used it as a wash of color for my eyelids. The packaging feels luxurious and the star design is very cute. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a go to drugstore blush that I have been using for years, so I was excited to try this Gucci Luminous Matte Beauty Blush in bright coral. The packaging is so pretty and substantial feeling. it feels buttery smooth on your skin, and the color is very buildable. I wore it out and it lasted all day on my cheeks. My only con is that it does not open all the way flat, which makes for holding it at an odd angle to see your reflection in the tiny mirror included inside. Otherwise, I would definitely recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great color! Itu2019s not insanely pigmented but I didnu2019t mind because I could build it, which I prefer. I used the Rosy Beige which is the second darkest one they have and my skin right now is borderline too tan/olive for it. I think once my summer tan fades a bit more it will be brighter. I feel like this color could also be blush or contour depending on how you use it- real cute on my nose too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the blush in shade 04 Bright Coral and it is absolutely gorgeous! This blush blends easily, a little goes a long way, and has a unexpected but pleasant floral scent. Itu2019s also perfectly matte and so breathable that it really provides the finishing touches to your face makeup. Love the cute packaging and Iu2019ve gotten a lot of compliments on my blush. Will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first thing that caught my eye about these blushes was the packaging - the compact is beautiful, which is not surprising as Gucci Beauty has done an exceptional job with the presentation of its beauty products. But, what about the actual quality and performance of the blush? Here's my honest and authentic opinion as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador after having it be my go-to blush for the past 5 days.   WHAT I LIKE:  * Soft, silky texture* Buttery smooth application  * Blends easily  * Buildable coverage  * Beautiful packaging  * Good lasting power - the color stayed on my face, with minimal fading or transfer, for about 7, sometimes 8, hours on most days.   AREA(S) FOR IMPROVEMENT:  * The shades in this initial release offered a nice variety for my fair-to-light complexion, but it would be great to see the shade range expand to include colors deeper than 06 Warm Berry (which, by the way, is gorgeous!). * I had some difficulty opening the compact and was afraid I'd dig my fingernail into the product when I did. It'll take some getting used to, for me, at least.  FYI / ADDITIONAL THOUGHTS: * 05 Rosy Beige (sometimes called Rosy Tan) is a neutral-to-neutral-warm dusty-rose/mauve brown shade.  * I found the finish of this blush to be more on the satin side - it's not matte nor luminous, despite its name. Looks natural on my skin; no shimmer or glitter particles. * Has a noticeable floral scent; I don't mind it and it does fade away, but those sensitive to fragrance, and especially to floral scents, might want to pass on these blushes.  BUY, BUY, BUY or BYE-BYE?  * I'm happy I picked up this blush and there are a couple of other shades that have caught my eye. That said, this isn't a must have but a nice-to-have item, especially if you like Gucci Beauty or luxury beauty products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Blush De Beaute in shade 02 Tender Apricot  by Gucci is such a nice blush.  The color is soft and blends well into my makeup. Thos formula is light and breathable. Didn't make my skin feel dry.  Though it is a pressed powder, it contains hyaluronic acid which helps retain moisture. The Blush is nicely pigmented and you don't need a lot.  It's  long wearing. I would recommend this to anyone who wears Blush. The packaging is also very nice and comes in a compact with a mirror. Nice for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary in exchange for my honest review, and the verdict is this is the nicest blush Iu2019ve ever had the privilege of using. It goes on so smoothly and stays all day. Perfect for busy on the go moms. It lasted me all the way from my morning boudoir maternity photo shoot to open house in the evening!! Would definitely recommend!!! From the gorgeous packaging to the shade, everything was perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After purchasing the Gucci 03 Radiant Pink Blush which I really loved, I then purchased the 04 Bright Coral. There isn't a huge shade difference on my skin but I'm not mad about it (ok, maybe a little, lol). The Radiant Pink seems to pack more of a punch. I love this bluch and how it looks on the skin. The formula melts into the skin and gives you a subtle natural luminosity. This is a gorgeous blush. The packaging is very nice as well. Although not a deal breaker for me, it unfortunately has a fragrance which I don't particularly care for that fortunately seems to dissipate after a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received shade 01 Silky Rose to review from Influenster. Iu2019m so happy with it. It really is a beautiful blush. Itu2019s easy to apply and lasts all day long. After a full day of work and an hour at the gym I could still see it on my cheeks. Definitely plan on picking up another shade or two during the next sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free for my honest review. Gucci knocked this one out of the park! This blush    is finely milled & smooth for an easy, even application with a medium dense to soft bristled brush. I also absolutely adore the luxe & weighty packaging! The warm berry shade is a beautiful fall color with buildable color payoff on my MD26 PM complexion. Highly recommended! Treat yourself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First off, the packaging is absolutely gorgeous. It can be a little tricky to open but itu2019ll definitely look fantastic on your vanity. Secondly, it applies and wears beautifully. I got the shade 02 tender apricot and itu2019s the perfect orange neutral for summer and fall (or anytime really). It doesnu2019t have too much pigment so itu2019s easy to build up to get your desired result.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the way this give my skin a youthful glow. The product is easy to apply and blend I just use my fingertips. I did have a hard time trying to get the container open it was a little disappointed that wasnu2019t a brush or applicator for me to use. However I would suggest this product as it had great performance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Usually Iu2019m not much of a radiant finish but this blush is so pretty! I have gotten so many compliments since trying this blush. It is now my every day go to and I absolutely love it!

reviews.review_text: The formula is amazing, it melts in to your skin and is so beautiful a must have

reviews.review_text: This is the perfect shade for a fair skinned blonde. I never would have chosen this shade on my own, but I received it in exchange for my honest review. This will definitely be a staple in my makeup bag going forward!

reviews.review_text: Itu2019s not very pigmented, and it is fragranced. Why does blush need perfume??? I cannot use this. Very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: The packaging can be a little tricky to open at first but the blush itself is very pretty. The shade tender apricot is a beautiful coral shade. I usually wear pink blushes so this one was a new for me and I absolutely love it. I wear it to work and it lasts me all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful, easily to apply, layers beautifully, last all day. I own two now but Iu2019m going to get two more colors because I love the formula so much. Pricy but worth it and such a beautiful vintage look and feel compact

reviews.review_title: My new favorite blush of all times!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to start this review off by saying wow! This Gucci beauty blush in Apricot color is fabulous. My first time using Gucci make up products and I am impressed with the quality. Blends in beautifully with a contour brush for my cheeks, and the formula smells good too. I not only used this on my cheeks to bring some natural glow to my face, but also applied this blush on my eyes. I love how versatile this product can be used and that it has a luminous matte finish. There were no issues with this blush breaking apart or any fall out product left behind. This blush is so lightweight feeling. The packaging is absolutely top end gorgeous. You can tell right away when opening the box that this blush is no joke. I looked up the price of this blush and I would most definitely purchase this in the future, now that I've had the opportunity to try it. The locking mechanism works great and does not open up while it is in my cosmetic bag. My skin type is a combination of dry and oily. I also like how they incorporated three amazing ingredients. Hyaluronic acid, shea butter and black rose oil. All three ingredients give the benefits that my skin needs when using this blush. I would highly recommend buying Gucci blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the packaging! Gucci packaging is always so beautiful. I tried the apricot shade of this blush and in the pan the color looks muted but upon application it has more color payoff than I expected. I have been using cream blush only for the past 6 months or more, so I was surprised I was so impressed with the powder. It didnu2019t look cakey, it was smooth and blendable, and a perfect color for fall! I worked a full shift at work and have worn it for over 12 hours and it is still as vibrant as when I first applied it! My only complaint is that it does seem a little tricky to open, but it could be user error..the product is also scented so if you are sensitive to fragrance you might now like this product. I personally really like the scent, it smells like a fruity floral perfume. Overall it is  a wonderful blush and Iu2019m happy to have it in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the second time now that I've tried to submit a review on this product. Lets hope this time all goes well that way I don't have to try to remember every exact word I wrote for a third time around! Lol I want to say first off this is one of the first times I've used a blush on my lids and didn't feel like the chalky powder formula of it completely stripped them of all their moisture. That inturn created God awful creasing, which this didn't at all. This silky, smooth formula smoothed across my lids seamlessly, and this color I received is great for the upcoming season of fall. Like clothes this time of year, you can layer this up, and down as well depending on your complexion, and ability to coordinate. I also had worn this on the apples of my cheeks and used a fluffy brush and blended it out towards my temples, and when I tell you don't knock it till you try it, I'm serious because at first glance after I had put a light sweep onto my apples I thought to myself oh man, what the heck am I gonna be able to do with this stuff her e? This is not a good color for me at all. I didn't want to except that I had to really get on my favorite sites and write bad reviews on a good product due to a color mishaps, so I decided to just go ahead and get out my brushes and go to work softening it out, and once I did I tell you I am so glad that I didn't just leave it at that and be done cause if I would've, I would've missed out on a really great product that's multipurpose, and great feelin on my skin. Thank you so much for reading my review and I hope that this helps someone who's just not too sure to close their eyes and just make the leap. Trust me, you'll not regret it. Looking forward for more products to review so look for reviews as I get some more products coming in. Xoxos

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Influenster and Gucci for my honest review. And the truth is that Gucci gave us a blush in a covetable compact thatu2019s so pretty itu2019ll make you want to take it everywhere with you. And thatu2019s the idea. The compact itself has a good weight to it and does not look or feel cheap. Gucci did it right with the materials they chose for the product.   I got to try out Tender Apricot 02 which is such a beautiful peachy color. The coverage is light but buildable; both translucent and pigmented. On the days you might want just a flush of color, itu2019s not a blush youu2019ll have to heavily blot after to get some of that pigment off. It has a beautiful velvety, smooth texture. Itu2019s great for creating a number of different looks and they encourage you to use elsewhere on your face. The peachy color did wonders on my eyes when I used it. Just a little bit on my lids and it brightened up my eyes.  Itu2019s definitely a versatile compact thatu2019s perfect for stashing in your bag (day/night) for little touch ups. The small size makes it perfect for evening bags.   Final verdict: this is the compact Iu2019ll be bringing with me for my long summer nights out in Greece. Not only is she pretty and worthy of my Euro travels, but she works well, too. Win, win!

It's a sweet pink shade called radiant pink. At first I thought it would be too light for my skin but it's the perfect shade for daytime with one quick brush or fun Barbie pink for evening with a couple brushes.  I put a little on my lids and cheeks after a base of tinted sunscreen and headed out to do my errands. It feel light and adds the ideal amount of shading for a casual daytime look.
